::Havoc::

Havoc turns around to face Demolition, the room shimmering into an 
exact replica of a Cybertronian city. "Yes, it has."

He stretches out his arm and a holographic version of his sword 
appears in his hand. It would hit the opponent but not hurt them more 
than a club would. He gets in a battle stance.

"Demolition, you and I will go first. Repressor will then join in for 
a simulated major battle."

Havoc watches Demolition, waiting for the bot to arm himself.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He entered the training room, ready for a little sparing.
> "Been awile since we did this last."
